home.title: A new chapter for transparency in government
home.description: KKMNOW is a collaboration between the Ministry of Health and the Department of Statistics to  institutionalise transparency, democratise decision-making, and make data accessible for all.

about.title: Meet the team behind KKMNOW
about.description: Investing into good and kind people pays for itself tenfold. Here at DOSM, we know that the brilliant minds below are are our greatest asset.
